import wec from "../src/images/f9.jpg"; import React from 'react' const Donate = () => { const [email, setEmail] = React.useState(''); const [password, setPas] = React.useState(''); const donate = async () => { console.warn(email,password); const userId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')); let result = await fetch("http://localhost:4000/donation",{ method: 'post', body: JSON.stringify({email, password, userId}), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" } }); result = await result.json(); console.warn(result); // localStorage.setItem("user", JSON.stringify(result)) // navigate('/') } return ( <>
